Class WiktionaryWriter

extends Object
    Writes an XML object tree as an XML file.

    Zachary Kurmas

      • setFormattedOutput

        public void setFormattedOutput(boolean value)
        Specify whether the resulting XML file should be formatted nicely (with whitespace and tabs).
        Parameters:
        value - true for nice formatting false otherwise.
        Throws:
        MediaWikiLoader.XMLConfigurationException - if the underlying call to setProperty throws an exception.

        Write the data rooted at root to output

      • write

        public void write(JAXBElement<?> root,
                  String file)
           throws FileNotFoundException,
                  JAXBException
        Write the data rooted at root to the specified file
        Parameters:
        root - root of the data
        file - file to write to (or "-" for STDIN)
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if anything strange happens.
        FileNotFoundException - if file can't be written
